findings.title: Maximum Transaction Without Limit
findings.description: The contract contains maximum transaction without limit, which can cause issues when the user tries to sell and the max transaction is 0 (Zero), potentially stopping transactions.

findings.title: Owner Can Stop Trading Status and Sell Tokens
findings.description: The owner has the capability to stop trading status and sell tokens owned even when trading is stopped, which can be a honeypot indication.

findings.title: Owner Can Set Fee Without Limit
findings.description: The owner can set fees without any limit, which is a honeypot indication.
